Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Netizens are anticipating the upcoming budget announcement by sharing their thoughts on social media. A Women's Economic Equality Taskforce letter of budget recommendations was released publicly by Minister for Women Katy Gallagher* with the aim to correct a significant wrong for those disadvantaged. Additionally Australia Institute research shares that the Stage 3 tax cuts are fiscally irresponsible and massively expensive. Some Aussie netizens are disappointed with the Labor Party's choices regarding refugees going against their own stated policies and acting against advice on job seeker. Others are optimistic hoping for budget reforms to reflect the values of a compassionate society emphasizing the importance of well-being budgets.
